mapper.select: SELECT app_info.id,softwareName,APKName,supportROM,interfaceLanguage,softwareSize,downloads,data_one.valueName as flatformName,STATUS,data_two.valueName AS statusName,categoryLevel1,app_one.categoryName AS categoryLevel1Name, categoryLevel2,app_two.categoryName AS categoryLevel2Name ,categoryLevel3,app_three.categoryName AS categoryLevel3Name,appInfo FROM app_info INNER JOIN data_dictionary AS data_one ON data_one.valueId = app_info.flatformId INNER JOIN data_dictionary AS data_two ON data_two.valueId = app_info.status INNER JOIN app_category AS app_one ON app_one.id = app_info.categoryLevel1 INNER JOIN app_category AS app_two ON app_two.id = app_info.categoryLevel2 INNER JOIN app_category AS app_three ON app_three.id = app_info.categoryLevel3 WHERE data_one.typeName ='所属平台' AND data_two.typeName='APP状态' AND app_info.id =#{id}
